review:
Dr Anubha Jain was flawless, at first I was quite reluctant and anxious because I hadn't visited a dentist over 5 years and thought that I'll have a lot of issues, but she was excellent at her work and spent over an hour to scale and polish my teeth to perfection and also filled my cavity to perfection, also she did make sure to call and follow up to make sure I had no post procedure issues.

It was my first experience at opus and with Dr Jain.
She also explained me the wear and tear and also adviced me as per what other issues might occur later.
The best part was she was passionate and dedicated about her work and dint act one bit commercial unlike other places.
I would rate Dr Jain 10/10. And will recommend every one to go to her for any dental issues.

Thank you 

Dr Jain and Opus

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Anubha Jain is very professional, yet calming. She patiently explained me the diagnosis and happily answered all my questions. The treatment itself was done very meticulously, and I'm happy with the result. 

The biggest positive for me was you can tell the doctor actually cares for the patient, rather than just carrying out a procedure, or trying to recommend expensive treatments, as is the case with many doctors these days. It allowed me to trust that I am in good hands. 

The clinic is spacious, and has a good number of assistant helpers as well, all actually concerned about the patient. 

Definitely recommend Opus and Dr. Anubha Jain.

Excellent, doctor was very calm and patient, appointment started a always on time, doctor was very informative and answered all my questions and concerns patiently and put my mind at ease during the treatment. I was completely at ease during the procedure and post it the next day, I had no pain. I would recommend this clinic and doctor to anyone without having to think twice.

My experience with Dr Anubha Jain was entirely positive. Dr Jain is cool, composed and professional. She is courteous, smiling and above all, sensitive to patient's condition and needs. Needless to say, my treatment went very smoothly and I highly recommend Dr Anubha Jain.

She's brilliant and diagnosed the problem **** **** *Shes very warm and courteous and instantly made me feel comfortable
While performing the procedure she would explain exactly what she was doing and why, which was very comforting. Extremely courteous, friendly and professional.

context: Dental Fillings, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Veneers / Laminates,Dental Cavity Filling,
review: Dr. Anubha is extremely particular with the treatments. She clearly lays out all the facts beforehand. It was great as always to get treated by her
Patient, smiling and communicative, responded to my queries and approached the situation in a very friendly yet professional way.

Dr Abubha Jain is a thorough professional.  She made me feel comfortable, and settled me in at first.  She explained what she was going to do, each time.  Her diagnosis of the problem was quick.  She suggested an effective remedy and saw through the implementation efficiently.  I had minimal pain and was very happy with her treating me.  I would highly recommend Opus Dental and Dr Anubha.

Excellent work with 200% perfection and Dr Jain personally called post treatment to check how I was feeling and if at all I had any discomfort. She makes you feel so comfortable and really makes any major problem a small one.

Thank you Dr Jain
Dr.Anubha Jain is excellent at her work. The treatment was very comfortable. I am very happy with the job done and I would totally recommend her to all.
It was excellent my teeth feel clean and bright :) thanks Anubha for the lovely service . The atmosphere was very warm and protective .

Excellent.. She made me feel very comfortable and did my treatment flawlessly.
She not only made my visit excellent but I'm going to recommended Dr Anubha Jain to every one.

Thank you Dr Jain for every thing.
She's Gods gift to dentistry. Such an amazing doctor. I would definitely recommend every Individual to go and check their tooth with her. Very very impressed by her treatment.
